title: Spiritbound Academy
description: A curse-scarred academy, a broken shrine, and the first step beyond the portal.

public_embed.title: Awakening at the Shrine
public_embed.description: Cold stone under your palms. A broken shrine. A blue portal flickers like a heartbeat. In the distance, bells from Spiritbound Academy echo through fog.

public_embed.title: The Sigil Answers
public_embed.description: The sigil warms under your fingertips. The portal reacts — not to power, but to intent. A whisper: 'Choose what you are willing to lose.'

public_embed.title: Spiritbound Academy Gate
public_embed.description: Students in ink-black robes watch from behind iron bars. A caretaker with hollow eyes offers you a lantern — and a warning about the Mirror Hall.

fields.name: Warning
fields.value: The caretaker speaks of mirrors that show truths best left unseen.

public_embed.title: The Mirror Hall
public_embed.description: Mirrors line the corridor, each reflecting a version of you that made different choices. One mirror bleeds shadow — a spirit is trapped inside.

fields.name: The Spirit
fields.value: It reaches toward you, desperate, pleading.

public_embed.title: A Pact in Candlelight
public_embed.description: The spirit bows. It offers a pact: protection now, but a debt later. The academy watches. So does the portal.

public_embed.title: Ending: The Spiritbound
public_embed.description: The pact seals with a warm sting. The spirit stands beside you. The caretaker smiles — not kindly, but knowingly. The story continues in your cards.

fields.name: Outcome
fields.value: You are bound to the spirit. A debt unpaid.
